values:
"what is your purpose in coming here tonight?" 
"to marry" they replied in unison.
"why would you take this woman to be your bride?"
"because i love her"
"why would you take this man to be your husband?"
"because he knows my secrets. because he knows my strengths & weaknesses. because i know his. because he will hold me if i fall. because he will turn to me if he is falling. because my life is not complete if he is not in it. because i love him."
"have you brought friends who will act as witnesses to your wedding? who will counsel you when you quarrel, rejoice when you celebrate, and comfort you when you grieve?"
"we have"
"let them identify themselves"
-state names-
"let all of you b e bound together in fellowship in recognition of this compact. for marriage is a living thing and must be tended. you who bear witness also bear the responsibility for reminding this man and this woman that marriage is not a step undertaken lightly. remind them to seek reconciliation when they are far apart, to sure for tenderness when they are tempted to be unkind, and to cherish each other no matter what trials or troubles the outside world affords."
-bride, groom, & friends drink from goblet-
"bound together in friendship"(to man & woman) "bound together in marriage. from this day forward, you will be known as husband and wife."
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/73192.html

Jacen went to his small windowless room and knew what he had to do. He had to find this woman, he had known from the moment that he touched her in the street that she would be the salvation or destruction of this world. He had seen her bathed in shining light, healing the world from destruction with her tears, she put her soul into the world to save it.. but he had also seen the destruction at those same hands. 
    He didn't know how to even begin to change her path from one to the other but he had to so something. He was given this curse, this burden, and knew that he couldn't just sit back and watch the world engulfed in flames to be obliterated before him. 
    He made his way back to the little windowless room in the back of The Silver Cutlass that had been his home for the last several weeks. As he stumbled past patrons and fumbled with the lock on the door he knew it would be the last time he made this trek, he wouldn't be coming back here again. 
    Jacen began gathering his few possessions, those which he hadn't sold for stronger drink in the last weeks. For the first time in months he had found renewed purpose. When Tania and Malkis had been taken away he had sought only retribution, he had stormed the hillside and seen that there was justice done for the family, the happiness that he had lost. The Gods had chosen to curse him with the sights of what was to come and everywhere he went there only seemed to be more impending tragedy and all of it had led him here.
    This shining palace of light, Jacen knew, was the source of all the darkness he had been fighting against. Once he had made it past the gates and into the city itself he had felt lost. All of his travels and all of his visions had brought him here, to the center of it all and then left him to wander the streets. He had tried several times to be granted an audience with the famed children of the light but to no avail. 
    He didn't need them now, he had found her.
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/72946.html

there are moments when my head seems to cloud, when all the junk and the life seems to back up and there is no escape... no escape but this. critics come and say what you will but at the end of the day i'll be the one standing. there is something strong in me, i'm not sure what it is but it won't give up. it won't give up on me or on my life, it won't let me give up on myself. i'm not sure what that means sometimes and i feel as if i'm alice eternally falling down the rabbit hole. nothing will ever be the same as it was yesterday or like it will be tomorrow.

i've tried so hard to let things go, but i guess that's kind of the point of life isn't it? you muddle through and things stick to you. some are bad, and you wish you could just wash it all away, but some are good. i know people always say to make the best of your situation but sometimes it just sucks, there is no best at that moment. sometimes there is only pain & grief, rage & emptiness. it seems so cantradictory to feel things like rage and still be empty. welcome to humanity, we are the great contradiction. look around and see what we are, what we're becoming. 

people rise & they fall. that is the way of life, something has to die for something else to step in and take it's place. some people are mostly good and some are mostly evil. is it in our genes? our surroundings? our souls? there really isn't any way to say. we all have the potential for great good and great evil, all of us, every one. maybe some carry more bags than others but isn't it our job as a community, as a race, to help with the burden? how have humans seemed to lose their humanity? 

sometimes bad things happen to good people and sometimes good things happen to bad people. all of life is good and all of life is bad. every decision you make effects other people. all of your life effects the lives of others. if you can't make your life work for you, make it work for them. 

sometimes its hard to see past all the ugliness. sometimes its too hard to look at someone who's hurt you and truly forgive. i hold no grudges. my life has been mine to choose, sometimes i have chosen wrong but it was my choice to make. some of the paths i walked down i never thought i could never make it back from, some i never did. life isn't one long road, it's a journey. stop as often as you can.

it builds and builds, i can feel it, it's an almost tangible thing. its like smoke being pumped in and coalescing to form... something. something real and alive, deadly and beautiful, soft and explosive. there is something in there, even if nobody else can ever feel it, ever see it. 

sometimes things just come out. i don't want to say it, i even try not to, but it happens. i cant seem to stop myself. why can't i stop? why can't i stop this thing that romps through my head and fucks up my judgement. this thing that tells me what's wrong and right and doesn't seem to have a clue.

i hear it calling. it starts like a background noise, gentle lapping of waves across the sand, the droning of the sea, never at peace, never truly still. it never rests, ever, but then the storm comes and you never expect it. on occasion you see the dark clouds forming but you can never tell how bad it's going to be or just when it'll hit. i try to control it. sometimes it works, sometimes it just delays a bigger shitstorm.

for all of the creativity & uniqueness that people claim they rarely surprise me. i feel jaded, i've seen it all. i've looked into the face of humanity, for the truly horrific or the truly benevolent, but the average, the makeup of what humanity is really comprised of, i'm not impressed. is this how we all are? we all think we're so special and wonderful, are we really? is your fucked up you?

is the great revelation that we're all truly unhappy & completely blissful all at the same time? i've seen the world laid before me, as so many others and yet i can seem to make my way down that road. i've lived it all and never lived.i'm a part of life but not alive.

so may days go by empty, they shouldn't be. that is my addiction. it's not the people, it's not the emotions, it's the being free. it's being in a moment where i can be me and not pretend anymore. sometimes you just have to let go and let the mask slip, just a little. that is what this life is about. the hard part is letting the mask slip and not covering it up. 

tell me i'm wrong, and i'll try to believe you. i want to believe in goodness and that somewhere is someone just as fucked up in just the right ways. the person that can understand the code and live by it while still accepting that certain things are just the way of life. 

these moments are timeless and can never be counted. never should be.
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/72553.html

i'm so fucking confused. maybe you are too, idk. i feel like i cant breathe, like my heart is being cut out of my chest one tiny sliver at a time. i still want so much to believe that you love me or that you could love me. you have no idea how desperately i need you. it's actually kind of sad. i love you so much that im willing to put myself through this, im pathetic. i'd die to know you love me but im all alone. why won't you just kill me? it would be so much easier. you could be rid of me, have your daughter, the person you really want to be with, and i could still die having loved you. i just dont know what to think anymore.
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/72230.html

the thought of him with someone else, it makes her ill, hate herself. 
she should have tried harder though she did her best, she prays to god this is just a test. 
she thought they could be a family but i guess it wasn't meant to be. 
a daughter that looks just like him, why am she so easy to leave on a whim?
she'll never be good enough, he said she was but that's a bluff.
the lies hurt more than all the rest, to know that it was just pretend
a husband, a father, a lover, a friend, and still ishe's alone in the end. 
maybe this is what she deserves, maybe she never stood a chance.
he use to smile and bring her roses, but that was just fake romance
she thought that he would understand, her once heartbroken man.
he said he wanted a family but she sits heartbroken as he leaves. 
not strong enough, not pretty enough, 
not a good enough mother, not good enough wife, 
not good enough to be part of his life.
she makes a whis, where's that magic star? that love will prevail after all.
anything, everything, she'd give it all to have just one more shot
she'd give up her heart, her soul, her life if love was what it bought.
she's screaming inside, trying to hide, needing the pain to stop
but still it goes on for her love is too strong and nothing can cut it off.
he said he'd tried but he lied she just wants another chance
to put the pieces back together to save her one romance. 
she knew it inside, you were trying to hide but love had blinded her
she sits and prays for something to change but maybe she's the curse.
she tries so hard to make him smile but nothing can make him happy,
except another, another lover, with her he's always laughing.
she begs and pleads 'what can i do?' but silence fills the air
she wants a simple answer, straightforward, but nothing's there.
to late, he says, i dont want to try, im just to miserable here
she hangs her head, thoughts filled with dread, this was her worste fear.
all she wanted was to hold on to her chance at happiness
to think that there was love in his wonderful caress.
but he has another who must be better it's driving her insane
to wonder still how far it's gone, she doesnt even know her name.
another sleepless night will pass because she doesnt understand
how could all this heartache and pain come from what she thought was a true man?
he swears his love but thenagain it's proably another lie
she prays to god, he'll changehis mind, and give it another try.
he'll never know how bad it hurts to be here in her shoes
she just keeps hope that maybe someday she'll be the one he'll choose.
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/71980.html

i cant do this anymore. i'm so fucking tired of this/ i thought that having you around would be easier, i thought that jaela would make me stronger. i guess nothing ever turns out the way you expect. i cant live in this house anymore. either we need to figure something out so that we can move...or me and jaela will. i hate to say it but i cant stay here. this place is killing me. if i have to i will take my daughter and go back to memphis. at least there i'll have people who actually care what happen to me. it hurts so fucking much to know that you care so little. 

it breaks my heart to watch my marriage fall apart infront of me. i really honestly thought that you loved me as much as i love you but once again i guess i was wrong. i'm in tears everysingle day and you just dont care. i tell you that my best friends father passsed away and you just go on talking about work like i dont even exist. you have no fucking clue what this is like.you tell me that i should talk to the doctor about post patum depression... are you fucking kiddin gme?! you think that is why im depresed? 

i hate to say it but im about ready to give up. i love you but i guess that it isnt enough when it's only one sided. i thought that you would be there for me and for jaela but you're just not. you made a promise to me once that i would always come before work. that's the only promise you ever made that i there was a chance you would keep. it's good to know now that you lied. you're always either at work, talking about work, working on stuff for work, or planning things for work. you always talk about how jessica was the one to blame for you not seeing andrew or being able to spend time with him... i'm not so sure that's true anymore. you avoid your own daughter like a disease, it's pathetic.

something needs to change, soon.
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/71874.html

It's funny how fast things move these days. it's so wierd to think about how things use to be just a few years ago or even a few months ago. life changes so quickly and i guess the only thing you can do is sit back and laugh. the things i worried about a year ago dont even really matter anymore. 

when you're a child minutes seem to creep by like hours but the older you get the faster time seems to start racing along. part of me wishes i could be a kid again but there is the other part of me that loves my life too much. of course, like anyone, there are a few things that i would change. i would be rich and none of my friends or family would ever need for anything ever again, i would have a beautiful house, andrew and i would have a big wedding & our own shop... and a set of nice harley's lol. 

some days present life seems like too much to handle but i guess that's just how it goes. the way i see it, you cant really appriciate the good days unless you have a few bad days once in awhile.
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/71003.html

this week has been kind of crazy. i've had to work alot and gettin stressed from that and then i found out the other night that brandi's house burned down. everyone made it out ok but they lost everything. xo when i had a chance i got online to look at the news channels and see if there was anything about how it happened. well i didnt find anything out about the fire but i did find out that mrs scott from my high school was beaten to death by her husband about a week ago. i am still kind of in shock about both of them i guess. i dont really know what to say either. i've been thinking about it and i just dont know.
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/70804.html

i wish i could say to you all the things deep down that haunt me. i love you, i do and that should make it easier right? well it doesnt for some reason. it makes it so much harder to talk to you. i can spill my conffessions to a complete stranger but to u i cant. i dont want u to see me sad or lonely or depressed but its part of who i am i guess. i cant stand for you to look at me with those eyes that want to help but see only sadness until they reflect it back. i hate that. i hate that i can effect u like this. i dont mean to. i dont know whats wrong with me and i hate that i cant figure it out and i cant be stronger for u and that i cant do all the things that i wish i could to make u happy or to make me happy and i dont know if this is gunna be ok i dont know about any of it and i have put so much of my life out there, out here for you and still it seems like nothing. i left it behind for you and you just smile and go on. everything im doing is for you. i wouldnt even try or go if u werent here with me. you dont push me to do it but i feel so bad about it that i need to push myself. for once i need to do somthing to make it better. im sorry
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/70494.html

i hate this feeling i know that i should be happy... this is what every girl dreams about right? well i guess not me. i hate sitting here all alone all day n feeling like a loser. i feel like i've lost all my purpose. im just here. i dont do anything im not helping anyone (icluding myself). i feel so useless here. i dont work, im not in school. i do nothing but sit here all say hoping and praying that someone will call or send me a message or something. i wish i could do something about it but i cant. i cant find the motivation to really do anything. i love andrew with all my heart but for some reason idk. i feel like i try to push him to do everything that he wants to do and help him get what he wants but when he sees me depressed he just sits there. i hardly get a "what's wrong?" and he wont help me. i know that im stubborn and wont ask for help but i shouldnt have to ask. if he sees that im not happy than why wont he try? and i try to make him happy but i cant help but feel like im failing. imm trying to be happy. i try so hard but for some reason i cant do it. what is wrong with me? i need help. someone please help me. i dont wunna be like this....
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/70367.html

well im back in memphis and have left knoxville behind for the summer. it hit me harder today than it had yet but i miss andrew so much. when i was driving off the other day it took everything in me not to burst into tears. i really do miss having him around there was just a happiness there that i had never felt. sometimes i think that im being stupid about this but im trying. im trying as hard as i can to be right but idk how well im doing. anyway i dont wunna write anymore... its too sad
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/69967.html

it's hard to explain how i feel right now. i can't believe that in a little over a week i will be leaving knoxville. there is so much that i am going to miss but idk. i guess that a summer away from here will help me grow... or something

i cant help but think that i wont be so missed around here. idk maybe i'm wrong (it's happened alot lately) but regardless of what happens this summer i'm happy now. and school sucks but i'll catch up, i'll make it work. i know that i can do this and i will make my life work out.
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/69700.html

if u can tell me what this is from u win the prize...




[Part 1]

I'm the son of raging love
The Jesus of Suburbia
From the bible of none of the above
On a steady diet of soda pop and Ritalin
No one ever died for my sins in hell
As far as I can tell
At least the ones I got away with

And there's nothing wrong with me
This is how I'm supposed to be
In a land of make believe
That don't believe in me

Get my television fix sitting on my crucifix

To fall in love and fall in debt

To keep me insane and doing someone else's cocaine

And there's nothing wrong with me
This is how I'm supposed to be
In a land of make believe
That don't believe in me

[Part 2: City Of The Damned]

At the center of the Earth
In the parking lot
Of the 7-11 where I was taught

It says home is where your heart is
But what a shame
Cause everyone's heart
Doesn't beat the same
It's beating out of time

City of the dead

Signs misleading to nowhere

Lost children with dirty faces today
No one really seems to care

I read the graffiti
In the bathroom stall
Like the holy scriptures of a shopping mall
And so it seemed to confess
It didn't say much
But it only confirmed that
The center of the earth
Is the end of the world
And I could really care less

City of the dead
At the end of another lost highway
Signs misleading to nowhere
City of the damned
Lost children with dirty faces today
No one really seems to careeeeee

[Part 3: I don't care]

I don't care if you don't
I don't care if you don't
I don't care if you don't care
[x4]

I don't careeeeeeeeee

Everyone is so full of shit
Born and raised by hypocrites
Hearts recycled but never saved
From the cradle to the grave
We are the kids of war and peace
From Anaheim to the middle east
We are the stories and disciples
Of the Jesus of suburbia
Land of make believe
And it don't believe in me
Land of make believe
And I don't believe
And I don't care!
I don't care! [x4]

[Part 4: Dearly beloved]

Dearly beloved are you listening?
I can't remember a word that you were saying
Are we demented or am I disturbed?
The space that's in between insane and insecure
Oh therapy, can you please fill the void?
Am I retarded or am I just overjoyed
Nobody's perfect and I stand accused
For lack of a better word, and that's my best excuse

[Part 5: Tales of another broken home]

To live and not to breathe
Is to die In tragedy
To run, to run away
To find what you believe
And I leave behind
This hurricane of fucking lies
I lost my faith to this
This town that don't exist

So I run
I run away
To the light of masochist
And I leave behind
This hurricane of fucking lies
And I walked this line
A million and one fucking times
But not this time

I don't feel any shame
I won't apologize

When there ain't nowhere you can go
Running away from pain
When you've been victimized
Tales from another broken home

You're leaving...
You're leaving...
You're leaving...
Ah you're leaving home...

ok so i know i've been posting alot the past 2 days but there has just been alot in my head. i promise that this is the last one for awhile.....

i wish i could stop these thoughts. to have something to distract myself. i want you. i know that one moment with you could heal every ounce of this pain. but here i sit alone, forgotten. i'm so easy to dismiss. hard to remember, easy to forget. everyone i love forgets so easy. i dont want to be numb but i dont know how to deal with this again. i know that this is is. this is where it ends. im sorry. why am i so easy to cast aside? i wish i could do something to make u love me, really love me. i pray that this feeling will go away but somehow i know it wont. 

i find myself searching for the words to say. im sorry that it has to end this way. i'll never forget the moments we had. but i cant live life feeling this bad. i tried to be the good girl who did it all right. but that didnt work im still empty at night. i wish you could see the pain i feel. this is a nightmare but this time it's real. it begins to spiral, i know im lost. and yet i still know you're not the cause. i may never know how this came to be. i leave this at its end and im left with only me. 

not who i was but what's who i want to be? is this really true? am i happy? some days it's hard and i sit and cry. i try to live but still want to die. what do i matter? there is no worth, just a hollow corpse that walks this earth. doomed to spend eternity locked in my cage of uncertainty. thriving on chaos but never life. time spent alone with fists clenched tight. if i never love i'll never lose in this game where all the players are fools. a shatter, its gone but what do i care? just the loss of a life that was never even there. 

it came so quickly, lack of feeling, when i prayed for salvation. emptiness but still thoughts reeling. i'll never be the same again. all my days spent in darkness, praying for the light i seek. never knowing happiness, trapped inside a shell so weak. i sit to watch the days go on but time is meaningless now. able only to continue and still never knowing how
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/69134.html

it's nights like this that i look at the scars and miss that feeling. the blade across my skin once more and i dont even feel a thing. i see the drops hit the ground, what beautiful crimson red, but still i feel nothing. i wish that it hurt. just a little. something to take my mind off the bigger, deeper pain. 

i cant believe u brought me to this. i said never again. i wish i could be stronger than this. since old habits are coming back i might as well jump in head first and go all out. it's easier this way. i promise. 

say goodbye
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/68979.html

every moment i will never forget, every smile, every word. i will remember every joke, every time u said u loved me. i wish that i could go back but i know better. i know things can never be the same. i know that thins have changed far too much. i just wish i were better. 

just another thought....

Dear Mr. President
Come take a walk with me
Let's pretend we're just two people and
You're not better than me
I'd like to ask you some questions if we can speak honestly

What do you feel when you see all the homeless on the street
Who do you pray for at night before you go to sleep
What do you feel when you look in the mirror
Are you proud

How do you sleep while the rest of us cry
How do you dream when a mother has no chance to say goodbye
How do you walk with your head held high
Can you even look me in the eye
And tell me why

Dear Mr. President
Were you a lonely boy
Are you a lonely boy
Are you a lonely boy
How can you say
No child is left behind
We're not dumb and we're not blind
They're all sitting in your cells
While you pave the road to hell

What kind of father would take his own daughter's rights away
And what kind of father might hate his own daughter if she were gay
I can only imagine what the first lady has to say
You've come a long way from whiskey and cocaine

How do you sleep while the rest of us cry
How do you dream when a mother has no chance to say goodbye
How do you walk with your head held high
Can you even look me in the eye

Let me tell you bout hard work
Minimum wage with a baby on the way
Let me tell you bout hard work
Rebuilding your house after the bombs took them away
Let me tell you bout hard work
Building a bed out of a cardboard box
Let me tell you bout hard work
Hard work
Hard work
You don't know nothing bout hard work
Hard work
Hard work
Oh

How do you sleep at night
How do you walk with your head held high
Dear Mr. President
You'd never take a walk with me
Would you

i cant believe it has been so long since i've seen your face. it seems like only yesterday we were on the bus screamin blink songs and bein stupid. so much has changed in 2 yrs. 

my mind keeps swimming over all these thoughts i can seem to stop it long enough to even get one out... im lost
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/68271.html

i sit here thinking once again and i wish u knew. i wish u could see this. i wish that you had some clue about what's in my head, what you've done to me. 

you know i love you but sometimes when you see me you get that look in your eyes and i know that you wish i would just disappear. i know im a disappointment but im sorry. i just wish sometimes that you loved me. 

you've broken me. i know im worthless. please let me disappear... please
http://saritaville.livejournal.com/68083.html

i know that i'm a mess. i am. i'm so sorry that im so hard to love but please try. i knwo that i'm not perfect, i'm nowhere near it, and never ever will be. i want to make things better. for once i want to be the good guy that makes life better and not worse. i dont know where i can go from here. im not sure if i will be able to find a way but im trying.

i'm sorry i couldnt be that person, 
the one you adore, the one you love. 
i'm sorry it happened this way and i 
know that we will never be the same

i pray to god i'm wrong and i wish on every star
til i find the one that answers all my calls

these walls are so empty, my head's spinning
i hoped that it wouldn't come to this
when it falls apart at the beginning
i'm sorry but i will not be missed

when u tell me of your heart, and what u feel inside
i dont want to walk away and restart this life

i wish i could tell you why i'm so scared
i wish i could be that kind of girl
but there is too much spinning in my head
and i don't know how to survive this world

its been awhile since my last update. there has been alot going on and i havnt been able to put words to any of it. i guess i'll start with a few thoughts i had earlier.... 

all the recent talk of valentines day has actually had me a bit bummed. lee called me and asked me for my address the other day because he wanted to send me a package of v-day things... im still not sure exactly what but i changed the subject and then said i had to go. Dustin now appears to be smitten with me (oh yes, i said smitten lol) and wants to take me out to dinner but i said that i have a huge paper due the next day (which isnt entirely true) so i said i wouldnt be able to go out that night. I've been thinking and there is really only one person that i want to go out with for v-day. It seems that i always go for the guy i cant have. 

i have also been thinking lately about my mother alot lately. i always thought that i never wanted to be anything like her but i realize that i am more like her than i realized before. i hate to think that i wanted anything but to be like her, regardless of all the mistakes she might have made she was a good mother nonetheless. i dont want to blame her (i hate the whole blame the parents cliche) but i have realized that alot of my psych problems come from her & my father. i think that part of why i dont let ppl get close to me is attributed to them. but we'll talk about that another day, i cant think about it anymore tonight.

with the recent thoughts of all the craziness and bullshit i have discovered somthing. i always thought that my family was never really much of a family (at least not to me because of the age gap) i realize now that i had the best family in the world all along. i have always said that my friends are like my family but now im starting to think they are not like my family, they are my family. i realized tonight that if i ever had a real emergency that there are always 2 ppl that i can call and i know.. really know that they would do anything they possibly could for me. if that's not family i dunno what is. 

i also realized today how much a simple comment from someone can mean. i saw an old friend from high school today and he made an offhand remark about how (even tho i was in pjs & no makeup) i looked great & stuff. even if he was just sayin it to be nice it was really nice to hear someone say that. its funny yo me how one small little comment can overpower all the negative thats been goin on lately. thanks brandon, it meant alot :)

loving the right person at the wrong time, having the wrong person when the time is right- and finding out you love someone right after that person walks out of your life... sometimes you think you're already over a person, but when you see them smile at you, you'll suddenly realize that you're just pretending to be over them just to ease the pain of knowing that they will never be yours again... in my opinion, some are afraid to see the one they thought they loved being held by someone else. most relationships tend to fail not because the absence of love (love is always present) it's just that one was being loved too much and the other was being loved too little. as we all know that the heart is the center of the body but it beats on the left. maybe that's the reason why the heart is not always right? most often we fall in love with the person we think we love but to only discover that for them we are just passing time. while the one who truly loves us remains either a friend or a stranger...

so here's a piece of advice;

let go when you're hurting too much.
give up when love isn't enough.
and move on when things are not like before.

i cant believe that before too long i'll be on my way back to knoxville. i dont wunna go back!!!! i knew i didnt really like it out there but i had no idea i hated it this much. i miss memphis so damn much. i miss brandi and heather and jessie and cliff and dawn and jason and turner and krystal and holy hell everyone!!

i wish i could just stay here. i dont really know how im gunna live there for another 4 months. i sounds like such a short time but it feels like eternity. ive met some cool people out there (dave & micheal and trey and stuff) but i just cant do it. but im not gunna swell on that. when my mother calls me a failure its bad enough. 

i have gotten to see alot of the old homies since i've been home. i got to meet some new ones too! it's been rather exciting. i know that when i go back to knoxville im gunna be all bored again and sittin in my dorm never doing anything.... omg im gunna die. im gunna fuckin go stir crazy. i think im startin to go a little nutty just thinkin about it but i know that it's gunna happen. 

whew! *breathe* so anyway. i really do love bein home tho. i can honestly say that many things have changed around here but i hope that it's all for the best. god bless my little party whores are growin up! lol its kinda funny but all the people i use to go out & get so incredibly fucked up with have gone straight or sumthin. i love those kids tho.

me and brandi are gunna go find sumthin to do tomm night... er well tonight and go have some fun. she re4ally needs to get out and about again. she got so use to just goin to work & sittin around on her own.... not with sarita in town dammit!!!! haha i dunno tho

ok so on a more serious note.... lee has turned into a stalker. he called me every 10 min for over and hour tonight & then when he started callin every 5 min i let brandi answer it & she was just like "uhh she's not here" and he hung up on her. i dont fuckin know what's goin on with that. he's startin to scare me. & me & that guy i was sprung on.. im over that. haha i actually am too! its so cool! i do have a new distraction as well and i like him but i dont live here so im sure nuthin os gunna come of this one. oh well. im glad that im a happy single chick. :) if i wasnt happy bein single i would be depressed all the damn time lol 

well umm i think i've run out of things to say. adios!

hey guys so i figure its been a little while since i updated & there has been some crazy shit goin down....so here goes

hmmm where to start?well as for school, im transferin back to memphis after next semester. utk just isnt workin for me. oh well....

but im home now! i almost forgot how much i fuckin miss memphis! there are just so many fantastic ppl here!! i got to hang out & drink with brandi a little bit last night and i absolutly love that girl!! its amazing, 15 years & she's still my best friend :) 

i got to meet alot o new ppl last night too. a BUNCH o new ppl lol it was fun as hell tho! i drove out to southaven (yes, missifuckinssippi) to go see my dude trey from ut & meet his friend nathan (aka mcgyver) & we had a blast. we ended up comin back to memphis & goin & seein brandi to cheer her up & then just crashin there. it was alot o fun. 

i got to hang with the family today too so that was cool. me & my sis were talkin bout my mom wantin me to move back in over the summer & how she understands why i dont want to. im glad somebody freakin gets it! lol 

but i've only been back a few days and only seen about 5 ppl on my list of ppl to see when im back so im sure there will be many more installments to this anthology of crazy memphis stories... but for now bed time (i was up til bout 8am then woke up @ 11:30 AND i got a dr appt in the mornin....sheesh!)

on my own again, lost in the darkness
all alone again, lost in my head 
and i know now who you are
i cant believe i ever fell for this

i cant believe i was so weak, cant believe u brought this out in me 
i know you never cared, i only thought u were there
why play these games, and trick my heart?
why run away when we're so far apart?
i dont understand, how u get to me again.

there was a time i thought you were everything i ever wanted
now i know its you who's everything i didnt need
i cant take this pain, this questioning
i wont go through it again, im sorry

ive become addicted to this pain
ive become a shell without a name
i lived for you, id die for you
i hate myself, because of you
i wish i could just walk away this time
i wish i could find the strength to end this lie
i know you see, and i know you hear
and i see you continue on without a care

i've shed my tears through all these years
gave my life away, to be with you another day
my one regret, my biggest mistake, my greatest love and my tortured hate
the best and worst in me is you, my sweetest pain and love so true
i back away

i know its time, to end these rhymes
this cant be life, i wont live this way
i know its time, to continue my life 
i wont be this, no, not again

im sorry my friend, but this is the end
i wont stick around, just to be let down again
so i say goodbye, wish u a happy life
i still believe in you, but this is what i have to do
so just know this, i will always love you
but remember that i will never go back
